QuestData.Title: Love it or Limpet
QuestData.Description: <Gazlowe spreads the plans on the table and jabs a tiny finger aft of the ship below the waterline.>$B$BThere! The hull is thinnest here, where the crankshaft meets the paddlewheel. And it's right next to the magazine!$B$B$n, I can't be held responsible if some enterprising Horde $c were to attach a limpet mine to that part of the hull. Not even if I supplied the mine. And paid $ghim:her;. Handsomely. The ship is anchored just southeast of here... go to it!$B$BThen radio me with this stolen gnomecorder.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Gazlowe's voice crackles through the stolen gnomecorder...
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Limpet Mine at the thinnest part of the hull of the Bellipotent.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did we make some nice kersplosions? Did we?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! I wish I could've seen the look on that Rear Admiral's face when his flagship went up like a candle. Let me use my telescope here to take a look at the damage.$B$BWhat - Whhhaaatt!? That thing is still floating? Hartley must've moved the munitions ashore in case his ship was mined.$B$BI underestimated you, Hartley... but for the last time!
